title: Drawing, Design for Sideboard with Raised Side Cabinets and Upper Shelf, 1900–05
title_raw: Design for Sideboard with Raised Side Cabinets and Upper Shelf
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite bottom left and center, illegible notations comprised of works, unknown  symbols, and "225" at center
creditline: Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society
description: Massive sideboard with six short tapering legs; lower tri-partite front has convex central section with two enclosed cupboard shelves topped by two drawers flanked by flat side cabinets extending above center front, each having closed cupboard shelf topped by two drawers; raised recessed cabinet with molded cornice joined at center by top shelf supported by extended back and two turned balusters at front.  Three open shelves at equal intervals above lower center front.

participants.person_name: The Lake St. Louis Historical Society

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Design for Sideboard with Raised Side Cabinets and Upper Shelf, 1900–05. Graphite on thin paper. 
Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society. 2000-69-32
